item.title: Salesforce shares jump on earnings beat and strong AI deals pipeline
item.description: Salesforce shares popped Wednesday on earnings beat and AI pipeline

item.title: Trump nominates Jared Isaacman, private astronaut and Shift4 CEO, for NASA chief
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Wednesday nominated Jared Isaacman to be NASA Administrator.

item.title: Tech stocks hit first all-time high since July
item.description: Technology stocks powered to new highs on Wednesday as the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite rallied 1% and investors poured into key software and megacap p...

item.title: Two stocks that could be hit hard from Trump's Canada and Mexico tariffs, according to Goldman
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump's tariff strategy could hurt two key apparel companies, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Trump picks Peter Navarro as top trade advisor
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced that Peter Navarro will serve as "Senior Counselor for Trade and Manufacturing" in his next White House term.
